Package grid

Class GridManager

java.lang.Object
grid.GridManager
public class GridManager extends Object
The GridManager class manages the grid system for the game. It handles loading tiles, loading maps, and drawing the grid.

      public Tile loadTile(String name, boolean isSolid)
      Loads a tile for the game.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the tile in the resources/Tiles directory
      isSolid - true if player cannot walk on the tile, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the Tile object
